trait.name: Draconic Origin
entries: The half-dragon is related to a type of dragon associated with one of the following damage types (DM's choice): Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Poison. This choice affects other aspects of the stat block.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The half-dragon makes two Claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 10 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) Slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage of the type chosen for the Draconic Origin trait.

action.name: Dragon's Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 14}, each creature in a 30-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}. {@actSaveFail} 28 ({@damage 8d6}) damage of the type chosen for the Draconic Origin trait. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.
